alert.name: Upstream gate jobs alert
alert.message: Some jobs are failing in the last 24h

alert.name: RDO master noop change results alert
RDO stable/ocata noop change results alert
RDO stable/queens noop change results alert
RDO stable/pike noop change results alert
Upstream zuul max enqueued time alert
alert.message: A lot of jobs at upstream tripleo gate queue, check https://zuul.openstack.org

alert.name: RDO zuul max enqueued time alert
alert.message: A lot of jobs at RDO openstack-check pipeline, check out https://review.rdoproject.org/zuul/.

panels.title: Upstream job status
panels.content: To look for issue check [sova gate jobs](http://cistatus.tripleo.org/gate/) and [upstream zuul](http://zuul.opentsack.org)

targets.query: SELECT "duration", "result", "log_url" FROM "autogen"."build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "job_name", "branch", "pipeline", "change"
SELECT max("enqueued_time") FROM "zuul-queue-status" WHERE ("pipeline" = 'gate' AND "queue" = 'tripleo') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "epoch" ORDER BY time DESC

panels.title: RDO job status
panels.content: To look for issue check [sova promotion jobs](http://cistatus.tripleo.org/promotion/) and [RDO zuul](http://review.rdoproject.org/zuul)
